subject: Update to version 458, minor packaging fixes
commitMessage:
Update to version 458, minor packaging fixes

- Update to version 458
- Move to correct group
- package LICENSE using %license macro
- remove executable bit from LICENSE file
- do not strip .comment section
- remove unnecessary autotools build requirements
- other cosmetic changes

Change-Id: Ia44fd42f775aa3c083bd84948c0004d9d0c18007
Signed-off-by: Jacek Bukarewicz <j.bukarewicz@samsung.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Verified+1

Patch Set 1:

cant the perm change be avoid ?

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

(1 comment)

Patch Set 1:

LICENSE file permission change can be avoided, but I think it shouldn't. For me it was a bug in the first place that it has executable bits set.
Or maybe you are suggesting to change them in a separate commit.
Uploaded patch set 2.

Patch Set 2: Verified+1

Changed group to System/Utilities following ?ukasz's suggestion

Patch Set 2:

(4 comments)

Note that the 'upstream/458' tag should pushed to the remote repo as well.

These cleanups look okay, and I have listed more comments/suggestions inline.

Patch Set 2:

I've pushed the tag.

Patch Set 2:

(2 comments)
Uploaded patch set 3.

Patch Set 3: Verified+1

I've made fixes following Patrick's suggestions

Patch Set 1:

(1 comment)

Patch Set 3:

Package is already in System/Utilities group (in patchset #2 and #3)

Patch Set 3: Code-Review+2

(1 comment)

One other very minor nitpick (see inline comment). Feel free to ignore for now.
Uploaded patch set 4.
Patch Set 4: Verified+1
Patch Set 4: Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
